full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement

### Programmer/Analyst Professional Services

* **Solicitation Number:** T8080-220152
* **Amendment Number:** 8
* **Publication Date:** 2023-01-27

**Request for Proposal (RFP)**

Transport Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) to obtain the services of a Contractor who will provide professional services in the category of Programmer/Analyst Power Apps Level 3 to support and maintain the business needs and transformation initiatives of Transport Canada.

The contractor will be required to design, develop, modify, and expand complex software solutions using Microsoft Power Apps and Application Programmable Interface (API’s), reports, workflows, entities, data management tools, Java scripting, and integrating various plugins.

**Supply Arrangement Certificate Required:**
To be eligible to participate in this procurement, suppliers must be holders of a valid Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) certificate. Suppliers must also meet specific requirements for Services in National Capital Region (NCR) and Level 3 resources.

**Other Details:**

* **Bidding Requirement:** A single bid per resource category is required.
* **Contract Duration:** Up to two (2) contracts, each for a single period from Contract award date to Dec. 31, 2024.
* **Number of Resources:** Estimated 18 Resources.
* **Security Requirement:** PSPC Common SRCL #19 applies.
* **Minimum Corporate Security Required:** Facility Security Clearance.
* **Minimum Resource Security Required:** Secret.

**Important:**
Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Method of Supply is refreshed three (3) times per year. Interested suppliers can contact RCNMDAI-NCRIMOS@pwgsc.gc.ca to inquire about becoming qualified supply arrangement holders.

**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-03-16T14:00:00

**Alternative Language:**
The solicitation documents may be obtained and submitted in either official language.

**Submission Plan:**
Please contact [Contact Information] if you have any inquiries about this procurement. 

**Additional Documents:**
Please visit the link below to access additional, relevant documents:

[Additional Document Links]

[Link to files from canadabuys.canada.ca]

---

Reach out to the authorities (Tony Youness) at tony.youness@tc.gc.ca or by phone at (343) 550-2603. for any inquiries you may have.  The document was
